Name: MPI_Barrier
Description: MPI_Barrier blocks all MPI processes in the given communicator until they all call this routine.

Parameters.Name: communicator
Parameters.Description: The communicator in which the barrier takes place.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the barrier.
- MPI_SUCCESS: The routine successfully completed.

Parameters.Name: communicator
Parameters.Description: The communicator in which the barrier takes place.

Parameters.Name: ierror
Parameters.Description: The error code returned from the barrier.
